languages.text: The Undying Emperor teleports the target to a cell adjacent to him. After that, he deals fire and rending damage to all enemies within a small radius around that target and removes all stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from them. These targets must pass an Agility resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer even more damage and be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Additionally, these targets must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (15) until the end of combat. Special: if the target has more than 90% wounds, it suffers +2 stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} and becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Teleports the target to the caster. After that, the caster deals Fire and Rending Damage in a small area (aiming at the target), applies {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}Prone{/g} for 1 round and {g|f:8da2a947a1a8bc543b9e7a9cad054414}Burning{/g} (15) until the . On a successful AGI Save (-40), the amount of Fire and Rending Damage is reduced and no {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}Prone{/g} is applied. On a successful TOU Save (-40), no {g|f:8da2a947a1a8bc543b9e7a9cad054414}Burning{/g} is applied. Purges {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Bloodstained Ally{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Bloodstained Enemy{/g}. Special: if the target has >90% Wounds, applies 2 stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}Fading{/g} and for 1 round {g|f:327db128df8b4ed5ad90fa64c3e413a9}Blinded{/g}.

The Undying Emperor teleports the target to a cell adjacent to him. After that, he deals fire and rending damage to all enemies within a small radius around that target and removes all stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from them. These targets must pass an Agility resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer even more damage and fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Additionally, these targets must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (15) until the end of combat. Special: if the target has more than 90% wounds, it suffers +2 stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} and becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 round.

The Undying Emperor teleports the target to a cell adjacent to him. After that, he deals fire and rending damage to all enemies within a small radius around that target and removes all stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from them. These targets must pass an Agility resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer even more damage and fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Additionally, these targets must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (15) until the end of combat. Special: if the target has more than 90% wounds, it suffers +2 stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} and becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 round.

The Undying Emperor teleports the target to a cell adjacent to him. After that, he deals fire and rending damage to all enemies within a small radius around that target and removes all stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from them. These targets must pass an Agility resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer even more damage and be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Additionally, these targets must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (15) until the end of combat. Special: if the target has more than 90% wounds, it suffers +2 stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} and becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 round.

After that, he deals fire and rending damage to all enemies within a small radius around that target and removes all stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from them. These targets must pass an Agility resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer even more damage and be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Additionally, these targets must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (15) until the end of combat. Special: if the target has more than 90% wounds, it suffers +2 stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} and becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 round.

The Undying Emperor teleports the target to a cell adjacent to him. After that, he deals fire and rending damage to all enemies within a small radius around that target and removes all stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from them. These targets must pass an Agility resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer even more damage and be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Additionally, these targets must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (15) until the end of combat. Special: if the target has more than 90% wounds, it suffers +2 stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} and becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 round.

languages.translation_comment:
DLC-1. Глава IV. Локация DeathCultTemple.
Желтая фаза (Огонь).
Телепортирует цель к себе и наносит высокий Rending+Fire урон в небольшом AoE-паттерне перед собой, на 1 раунд накладывает статус Prone (AGI Save -40) и на 2 раунда накладывает средний Burning (TOU Save -40). При успешном спасброске наносит средний Rending+Fire урон. Снимает стаки Bloodsoaked. Высокая дистанция применения.
Особое свойство: Если у цели >90% ХП, дополнительно накладывает до конца боя 2 стака Fading и на 1 раунд Blinded.

languages.text: Неумирающий Император переносит цель на соседнюю с собой клетку. После этого он наносит огненный и раздирающий урон всем врагам в небольшом радиусе вокруг этой цели и снимает с них все уровни {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}кровавого благословения{/g} и {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}кровавого приговора{/g}. Эти цели выполняют проверку Ловкости на сопротивление со штрафом −40 и в случае провала получают еще больший урон и оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g} на 1 раунд. Также эти цели совершают проверку Выносливости на сопротивление со штрафом −40 и в случае провала получают {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (15) до конца боя. Особое свойство: если у цели больше 90% здоровья, она получает +2 уровня эффекта {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}угасающий дух{/g}, а также {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g} на 1 раунд.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor teleports the target to a cell adjacent to him. After that, he deals fire and rending damage to all enemies within a small radius around that target and removes all stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from them. These targets must pass an Agility resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer even more damage and be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Additionally, these targets must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (15) until the end of combat. Special: if the target has more than 90% wounds, it suffers +2 stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} and becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 round.

После этого он наносит огненный и раздирающий урон всем врагам в небольшом радиусе вокруг этой цели и снимает с них все уровни {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}кровавого благословения{/g} и {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}кровавого приговора{/g}. Также эти цели совершают проверку Выносливости на сопротивление со штрафом −40 и в случае провала получают {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (15) до конца боя. Особое свойство: если у цели больше 90% здоровья, она получает +2 уровня эффекта {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}угасающий дух{/g}, а также {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g} на 1 раунд.

Неумирающий Император переносит цель на соседнюю с собой клетку. После этого он наносит огненный и раздирающий урон всем врагам в небольшом радиусе вокруг этой цели и снимает с них все уровни {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}кровавого благословения{/g} и {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}кровавого приговора{/g}. Эти цели выполняют проверку Ловкости на сопротивление со штрафом −40 и в случае провала получают еще больший урон и оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g} на 1 раунд. Также эти цели совершают проверку Выносливости на сопротивление со штрафом −40 и в случае провала получают {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (15) до конца боя. Особое свойство: если у цели больше 90% здоровья, она получает +2 уровня эффекта {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}угасающий дух{/g}, а также {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g} на 1 раунд.

languages.text: El Emperador Inmortal teletransporta al objetivo hasta una casilla adyacente a él. A continuación, inflige daño por fuego y acerado a todos los enemigos situados en un radio pequeño alrededor de ese objetivo y elimina todas sus acumulaciones de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecido por la sangre{/g} y {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g}. Estos objetivos deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad con una penalización de −40 o sufrirán un daño aún mayor y quedarán {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g} durante 1 asalto. Además, estos objetivos deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia con una penalización de −40 o sufrirán el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (15) hasta el final del combate. Especial: si el objetivo tiene más del 90 % de sus heridas, recibe +2 acumulaciones de {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}alma evanescente{/g} y sufre {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ceguera{/g} durante 1 asalto.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor teleports the target to a cell adjacent to him. After that, he deals fire and rending damage to all enemies within a small radius around that target and removes all stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from them. These targets must pass an Agility resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer even more damage and be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Additionally, these targets must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (15) until the end of combat. Special: if the target has more than 90% wounds, it suffers +2 stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} and becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: El Emperador Inmortal teletransporta al objetivo hasta una casilla adyacente a él. A continuación, inflige daño por fuego y acerado a todos los enemigos situados en un radio pequeño alrededor de ese objetivo y elimina todas sus acumulaciones de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecido por la sangre{/g} y {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g}. Estos objetivos deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad con una penalización de −40 o sufrirán un daño aún mayor y quedarán {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g} durante 1 asalto. Además, estos objetivos deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia con una penalización de −40 o sufrirán el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (15) hasta el final del combate. Especial: si el objetivo tiene más del 90 % de sus heridas, recibe +2 acumulaciones de {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}alma evanescente{/g} y sufre {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ceguera{/g} durante 1 asalto.

languages.text: 不死の皇帝は対象を自分に隣接するマスにテレポートさせる。その後、その対象を中心とした小さな半径内のすべての敵に火傷と裂傷ダメージを与え、{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}と{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血まみれ{/g}のスタックをすべて取り除く。これらの対象は-40のペナルティを伴う敏捷性抵抗判定に合格しなければならないと、さらにダメージを受け、1ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}うつ伏せ{/g}になる。さらに、これらの対象は-40のペナルティを受けた耐久力抵抗判定に合格しなければ、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}（15）を負う。 特別：対象が90%以上の傷を負っている場合、+2スタックの{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}消える魂{/g}を受け、1ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor teleports the target to a cell adjacent to him. After that, he deals fire and rending damage to all enemies within a small radius around that target and removes all stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from them. These targets must pass an Agility resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer even more damage and be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Additionally, these targets must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (15) until the end of combat. Special: if the target has more than 90% wounds, it suffers +2 stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} and becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: 不死の皇帝は対象を自分に隣接するマスにテレポートさせる。その後、その対象を中心とした小さな半径内のすべての敵に火傷と裂傷ダメージを与え、{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}と{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血まみれ{/g}のスタックをすべて取り除く。これらの対象は-40のペナルティを伴う敏捷性抵抗判定に合格しなければならないと、さらにダメージを受け、1ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}うつ伏せ{/g}になる。さらに、これらの対象は-40のペナルティを受けた耐久力抵抗判定に合格しなければ、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}（15）を負う。 特別：対象が90%以上の傷を負っている場合、+2スタックの{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}消える魂{/g}を受け、1ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}になる。

languages.text: 不死神皇将目标传送至自身邻近的格子处，随后对周围小范围内所有敌人造成火焰伤害与撕裂伤害，同时移除目标所有{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}与{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}层数。所有受影响的单位都需要进行敏捷抗性检定，且在检定中承受-40减值，未能通过检定的单位会承受额外伤害， 同时陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续一轮。除此之外，所有目标还需要进行坚韧抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-40减值，未能通过检定的单位会被施加{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（15）效果，持续至战斗结束。 特殊效果：如果目标生命值高于90%，则不死神皇会额外施加2层{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}灵魂凋零{/g}效果，同时{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}目标，持续一轮。
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor teleports the target to a cell adjacent to him. After that, he deals fire and rending damage to all enemies within a small radius around that target and removes all stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from them. These targets must pass an Agility resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer even more damage and be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Additionally, these targets must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (15) until the end of combat. Special: if the target has more than 90% wounds, it suffers +2 stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} and becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: 不死神皇将目标传送至自身邻近的格子处，随后对周围小范围内所有敌人造成火焰伤害与撕裂伤害，同时移除目标所有{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}与{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}层数。所有受影响的单位都需要进行敏捷抗性检定，且在检定中承受-40减值，未能通过检定的单位会承受额外伤害， 同时陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续一轮。除此之外，所有目标还需要进行坚韧抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-40减值，未能通过检定的单位会被施加{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（15）效果，持续至战斗结束。 特殊效果：如果目标生命值高于90%，则不死神皇会额外施加2层{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}灵魂凋零{/g}效果，同时{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}目标，持续一轮。

languages.text: Der Todlose Imperator teleportiert ein Ziel auf eine Zelle neben sich. Anschließend fügt er allen Gegnern in einem kleinen Radius um das Ziel Feuer- und rüstungsbrechenden Schaden zu und entfernt alle {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g}- und {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Blutbefleckt{/g}-Stapel. Diese Ziele müssen eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit mit −40 bestehen, um nicht noch mehr Schaden zu erleiden und 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g} zu werden. Außerdem müssen diese Ziele eine Widerstandsprobe auf Zähigkeit mit −40 bestehen, um nicht bis zum Ende des Kampfes mit {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} (15) belegt zu werden. Spezial: Hat das Ziel mehr als 90 % Wunden, wird es mit +2 Stapeln {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}Schwindende Seele{/g} belegt und ist 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor teleports the target to a cell adjacent to him. After that, he deals fire and rending damage to all enemies within a small radius around that target and removes all stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from them. These targets must pass an Agility resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer even more damage and be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Additionally, these targets must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (15) until the end of combat. Special: if the target has more than 90% wounds, it suffers +2 stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} and becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Der Todlose Imperator teleportiert ein Ziel auf eine Zelle neben sich. Anschließend fügt er allen Gegnern in einem kleinen Radius um das Ziel Feuer- und rüstungsbrechenden Schaden zu und entfernt alle {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g}- und {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Blutbefleckt{/g}-Stapel. Diese Ziele müssen eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit mit -40 bestehen, um nicht noch mehr Schaden zu erleiden und 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g} zu werden. Außerdem müssen diese Ziele eine Widerstandsprobe auf Zähigkeit mit -40 bestehen, um nicht bis zum Ende des Kampfes mit {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} (15) belegt zu werden. Spezial: Hat das Ziel mehr als 90 % Wunden, wird es mit +2 Stapeln {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}Schwindende Seele{/g} belegt und ist 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g}.

languages.text: L'Empereur Immortel téléporte la cible sur une case adjacente. Il inflige ensuite des dégâts de feu et de lacération à tous les ennemis présents dans un rayon réduit autour de la cible et dissipe tous leurs cumuls de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} et {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g}. Les cibles affectées doivent réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité avec une pénalité de −40. En cas d'échec, elles subissent des dégâts supplémentaires, ainsi que l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 round. Elles doivent également réussir un test de résistance d'Endurance avec une pénalité de -40, ou subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (15) jusqu'à la fin du combat. Spécial : si la cible dispose de moins de 90 % de ses blessures, elle subit 2 cumuls d'{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}Âme affaiblie{/g}, ainsi que l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} pendant 1 round.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor teleports the target to a cell adjacent to him. After that, he deals fire and rending damage to all enemies within a small radius around that target and removes all stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from them. These targets must pass an Agility resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer even more damage and be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Additionally, these targets must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (15) until the end of combat. Special: if the target has more than 90% wounds, it suffers +2 stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} and becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: L'Empereur Immortel téléporte la cible sur une case adjacente. Il inflige ensuite des dégâts de feu et perforants à tous les ennemis présents dans un rayon réduit autour de la cible et dissipe tous leurs cumuls de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} et {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g}. Les cibles affectées doivent réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité avec une pénalité de -40. En cas d'échec, elles subissent des dégâts supplémentaires, ainsi que l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 round. Elles doivent également réussir un test de résistance d'Endurance avec une pénalité de -40, ou subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (15) jusqu'à la fin du combat. Spécial : si la cible dispose de moins de 90 % de ses blessures, elle subit 2 cumuls d'{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}Âme affaiblie{/g}, ainsi que l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} pendant 1 round.

L'Empereur Immortel téléporte la cible sur une case adjacente. Il inflige ensuite des dégâts de feu et perforants à tous les ennemis présents dans un rayon réduit autour de la cible et dissipe tous leurs cumuls de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} et {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g}. Les cibles affectées doivent réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité avec une pénalité de -40. En cas d'échec, elles subissent des dégâts supplémentaires, ainsi que l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 round. Elles doivent également réussir un test de résistance d'Endurance avec une pénalité de -40, ou subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (15) jusqu'à la fin du combat. Spécial : si la cible dispose de moins de 90 % de ses blessures, elle subit 2 cumuls d'{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}Âme affaiblie{/g}, ainsi que l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} pendant 1 round.

languages.text: Ölmeyen İmparator, hedefi bitişiğindeki bir hücreye ışınlar. Ardından o hedefin yakın çevresinde bulunan tüm düşmanlara ateş ve yırtma hasarı verir. Ayrıca üzerlerindeki tüm {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}kanla vaftiz{/g} ve {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}kan yarası{/g} birikimlerini kaldırır. Bu hedefler, −40 ceza puanına sahip bir Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmelidirler. Aksi takdirde daha da fazla hasar alır ve 1 rauntluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilirler{/g}. Ayrıca bu hedefler, −40 ceza puanına sahip bir Dayanıklılık direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde çatışma sonuna dek {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} (15) etkisine maruz kalırlar. Özel: Hedef, %90'dan daha fazla sağlık puanına sahipse +2 {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}solan ruh{/g} birikimine maruz kalır ve 1 rauntluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşir{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor teleports the target to a cell adjacent to him. After that, he deals fire and rending damage to all enemies within a small radius around that target and removes all stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} from them. These targets must pass an Agility resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer even more damage and be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Additionally, these targets must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (15) until the end of combat. Special: if the target has more than 90% wounds, it suffers +2 stacks of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} and becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 round.
